akas: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (original title)
akas from release info: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (original title)

1.title: Chevy Connection

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Tommy agrees to fix up a '68 Chevelle for a client who wants to hand it down to her son. It was her late husband's car and she wants to keep it in the family. Also, the boys dig up a '71 Chevy C10 from a client who wants his pickup turned into a sleeper.

2.title: Mopar Muscle

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Tommy and the boys beef up a teacher's 1973 Plymouth Roadrunner GTX to race an imported, DIY-Tuner Car that a former student has been bragging about. Also, a son brings in a '59 Lincoln Continental to be restored in memory of his late mother.

3.title: Go GTO Go

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Tommy and the Christmas Auto crew build a '66 Pontiac GTO for a family who wants to take it out onto a road course. Also, Steve's cousin Kenny wants to modernize his 63' Impala lowrider. The boys need to get up to speed in order to get these cars done.

4.title: Monster Riviera

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Tommy gets a commission to transform a '65 Buick Riviera into a gasser! Meanwhile, Chuck and Andy bring back a rusted out '85 Chevy El Camino. It's a sentimental build for the client who wants it redone as a memorial for her father and brother.

5.title: Muddin' and Monzas

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Tommy and the boys at Christmas Auto build a 1980 Chevy Monza to be a ten second track killer. Also, Steve tries to prove he's more than just a mechanic and brings in a 1974 Ford Bronco to turn into an off-road machine for this year's Truck Night.

6.title: Hellcat Challenger

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Tommy and the Christmas Auto boys commission a '67 Dodge Dart as a surprise for a soldier retiring from the military. Also, Andy and Chuck build a 72' Dodge Challenger for their landlord's son. The boys need to kick it into gear to get it all done.

7.title: 1,000 Horses

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Tommy and the gang at Christmas Auto commission a '74 Ford Pinto Wagon from a client who wants it to be a 12 second street beast. Also, the boys bring in a '67 Plymouth Belvedere from a client who wants a 1000hp, 9 second Super Stock clone.

8.title: Fly Falcon Fly

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Tommy rebuilds his 65' Ford Falcon to enter in the final race of the season at Quaker City Motorsports Park. Also, the Christmas Auto boys beef up a 73' Gran Torino for a fireman that wants to race one of his colleagues on a road course.

1.title: Rustbelt Galaxie

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Tommy and Steve set out to re-build a 64 Ford Galaxie, which will be passed down from father to son. Chuck and Andy buy a 69 Dodge Coronet Convertible, with the intentions of turning it into a tribute to the super rare Dodge Coronet Convertible R/T.

2.title: Supercharged Chevelle

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Tommy helps a friend break up Matching Numbers on a 1971 Chevy Chevelle SS to make it run a faster quarter mile. Steve and Andy seek out a classic Vette to flip at an annual Corvette show but when they arrive there are a lot of lookers but no takers.

3.title: Mustangs and Mavericks

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Tommy agrees to find and rebuild a 68 Mustang Fastback GT to make a client's dream come true. And when a 1971 Maverick comes at the shop, he can't resist helping out a true American Hero. The guys talk Tommy into rebuilding an old ice cream truck.

4.title: Nitrous Charged Vega

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Tommy agrees to find and rebuild a 68 Mustang Fastback GT to make a client's dream come true. And when a 1971 Maverick comes at the shop, he can't resist helping out a true American Hero. The guys talk Tommy into rebuilding an old ice cream truck.

5.title: Thunderbirds and Superbirds

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: The owner of a rare 1970 Plymouth Superbird comes to Christmas Auto. He needs Tommy's help to take down his long time rival in a head to head, Superbird vs Superbird race. Chuck and Andy attempt to bring a drag car that's in a million pieces back to life.

6.title: Breaking Barracuda

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Tommy's dad visits the shop to have work done on his 1969 Plymouth Barracuda. Tommy will do it for free but first, his dad must agree to a friendly wager. Andy and Chuck get themselves in a heap of trouble when they agree to restore a 1956 Ford Short Bed.

7.title: Fairlanes and Firebirds

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Tommy and the gang transform a '69 Fairlane into a Cobra Fairlane for a client whose dad passed away while they were building it. They fix up a '68 Firebird for an overweight owner trying to claim bragging rights in a sibling rivalry with his brother.

8.title: Who's the Boss Mustang

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Tommy accepts a job to revamp a 1969 Ford Mustang Boss 302 for a client who's eager to beat his son's 2012 Mustang Boss in a road race. Meanwhile, the boys decide to help out an old lady get her 1960 Thunderbird running again.

9.title: It's a Delorean!

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Christmas Automotive travels through time...to rebuild a DeLorean, made famous by the classic movie, Back to the Future. On top of that, a local drag racing legend named Wild Bill tasks them with rebuilding his 64 Chevy Nova that runs on alcohol.

10.title: King of Camaros

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Tommy volunteers his services to build a dragster for a young girl who's moving up the ranks in the dragster community. If that wasn't enough, Andy and Chuck bring back a 1969 Camaro Z28 that the client wants restored, but it's a full overhaul.

11.title: Scramblers and Sleeper Cars

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Tommy and the gang restore one of the most unique muscle cars of all time: the Patriotic 1969 AMC SC Rambler and flip a couple of "sleeper" cars, a Shelby GLHS and a Dodge Spirit RT.

12.title: Fast 69 Charger, Furious 78 Malibu

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Tommy and the Christmas Automotive crew are hired to re-create the classic Dodge Charger stunt car from The Fast and The Furious for a stunt woman. As if that weren't enough, the boys are called upon by a seasoned drag racer to build a 1978 Chevy Malibu.

13.title: A Real American Camaro

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Tommy and the gang rebuild a 1975 Camaro for Chuck's son as a surprise graduation gift from Boot Camp. They also restore a 1963 Impala for a local police officer.

14.title: Scary Fast El Camino

episode of.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Tommy and the Christmas Auto boys head to New Orleans to meet up with a client who wants to turn his 1967 El Camino into a scary fast street machine. On the way, the gang picks up a 1969 AMC Javelin in hopes that they can quickly sell it down in Louisiana

imdb.title: Fat N' Furious: Rolling Thunder
plot: Four brothers in the Youngstown Ohio area run a mechanic shop
